lender.name: Hannah & Kali
lender.loan_because: We asked friends for donations instead of Christmas presents
lender.occupational_info: My mom builds cancer centers, my dad stays home and takes care of us. My sister & I are students

lender.name: Katie Sweet
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their goals and fulfill their dreams. My loan is a gift of hope.
lender.occupational_info: I am a future educator who wishes to instill in my students the knowledge they can change the world through their actions. While we may not be able to make big changes individually, working together our small efforts will make big changes.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I've had the privilege of working on international aid projects in Afghanistan, Georgia, and Trinidad. I know first hand that cultures have so much to learn from each other, that people are inherently similar the world over although culture has a strong affect on shaping a person's values and outlook, and that a small loan can do so much for people who truly want to improve their lives, families, and communities. It's probably obvious from my photo that I'm the fellow seated in the middle who had the good fortune to work with some wonderful and very hospitable Georgian farmers.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a management consultant who works with organizations and communities that are trying to change the world by helping them with planning, leadership, management, marketing, and land issues.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large public university, as a science librarian.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: it helps people.
lender.occupational_info: I don't go to work. I go to school.

lender.name: ALICHIA
lender.occupation: Mother of 3, Wife, Student, and Entrepreneur
lender.loan_because: I love to help and empower others. By empowering others I also help myself to become what I want to be. It is a gift from God to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: It is my joy to help those like myself, women raising children and aspiring to give the best life possible to their families. It is my desire to give strength, power, and stability to those in need.

lender.name: GD MoCity
lender.loan_because: we would like to give something back to people in need.

lender.name: Mozam
lender.loan_because: it feels good!

lender.name: olaseni soewu
lender.loan_because: want the loan to manufacture BIOSAND FILTER for our various communities that have water and sanitation problems. The amount of $3,000.00 would be required and payable in 18 months of equal instaments after the moratum period.
lender.occupational_info: Since ours is participatory development so we need good, portable drinking water and sanitation for development We would also train other members of the communities to manuafcture and instal BIOSAND FILTER for clean drinking water and good sanitation.

lender.name: Arild
lender.loan_because: I travel a lot and meet people who need help
lender.occupational_info: I write about tourism, conservation and development

lender.name: CathyM
lender.loan_because: I believe that anyone who is willing to work hard should have the opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, turned computer professional, working within a company committed to bettering the lives of MS & Cancer patients through drug research & development.

lender.name: Jodelle
lender.loan_because: Most of the reasons my life is so easy weren't my choice. Most of the reasons these peoples lives are hard weren't their choice.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others the skills they need to be successful in their work.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to......
lender.occupational_info: Attempting to help immigrant populations via implementing simultaneous medical interpreting in hospitals.

lender.name: Ewa & Jim
lender.loan_because: We belive that here even a small amount for us can make a big change for some!

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: A leg up is better than a hand out!

lender.name: joseph
lender.loan_because: im nice,
lender.occupational_info: internet

lender.name: Ilari
lender.loan_because:
I want to contribute to a better world, slowly but steadily. I have seen a lot of poverty during my travels abroad.
I am not a rich guy, far from it, but thanks to KIVA I don't have to be.
Nobody can say anymore that it is difficult to help. Or that the money does not go where it should. I have not found a charitable organization more transparent than KIVA.
I'm especially happy about the fact that the entrepreneurs come from so many different countries.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: Microloan is the way to go

lender.name: JLPS
lender.loan_because: We care about others.

lender.name: Szabi
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I do research and teach physics

lender.name: Johnny Alan
lender.loan_because: It's important to me that we all help each other along life's path.
lender.occupational_info: I compose music for projects I am inspired by and to express the creativity that comes from inside me.

lender.name: ANGEL
lender.loan_because: Corte venta y distribucion de todo tipo de Piedra Laja de Arequipa, para enchape de pared y piso, diferentes Colores y tamaños. y necesito el prestamo para poder comprar material
lender.occupational_info: Compro, Corto y distribuyo, buscando clientes por internet y en todas las municipalidades ya que la piedra qu distribuyo sirve para poner piso en plazas y parques.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Microfinance makes so much sense and holds so much potential. Ordinary people, from around the world pooling resources in this way is very exciting. We can't rely on others to make the difference; we need to do it ourselves.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I hire employees, work with managers, and handle all company benefit programs.

lender.name: PJS
lender.loan_because: I am self-employed and enjoy helping others fulfill their dreams like I had help with mine.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Ivana
lender.occupation: currently working part-time in UNDP Bulgaria

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: When my son became ill so many people stepped in and offered help. There is no way I can repay those who assisted us. I can only try to pass it along as best I can in what ever ways I can. Everyone has certain challenges but no one should face them alone. This is one small way I can return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I manage about 12 employees at our local bank.

lender.name: Margaret & Shel
lender.loan_because: We are delighted to share our abundance with others.

lender.name: Adele
lender.loan_because: "The World is my country, all mankind are my brethren, and to do good is my religion." - Thomas Paine

lender.name: Ray and Angela
lender.loan_because: We believe that when you help a woman succeed she then uses that opportunity to improve the education and safety of her children. This in turn improves the lives of many.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.occupation: Director of International Programs, United Planet

lender.name: Danae
lender.loan_because: my money is God's money. I have also been to two very impoverished countries, so my heart loves to give to those who want to build a small business and get themselves out of the rut of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying Child and Adolescent Development.

lender.name: Alma&Lucas
lender.loan_because: I have great respect for people who try to improve their lives and also believe that the future is in their hands.

lender.name: Kaylie
lender.loan_because: I have a pretty good life, and think that other people should, too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an 8th grade student. What else do you need to know?

lender.name: Hanabal
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves. Helping those willing to apply their efforts and take a risk helps maintain the balance of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph nature to preserve the moments that move too fast to remember.

lender.name: Shower SpeX
lender.loan_because: Shower SpeX would like to give back an help a fellow business owners.
lender.occupational_info: Shower SpeX-Identify Shampoo and Conditioner in the shower without our glasses. Never wash your hair with Conditioner again!

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I want to help alleviate poverty.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to travel through many of the countries that Kiva supports and have found the people very friendly and generous despite having far less resources then myself. I use Kiva because I trust that a microfinance system will deliver the money where it is needed.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop internet applications for business use... so something like this website.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business owners throughout the world. I firmly believe that people helping people is the way to lift the world out of poverty. A percentage of our corporate profits are used to make Kiva loans.

lender.name: Lillian
lender.loan_because: I find pleasure in sharing with others and it pleases God.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a church. My responsibilities are to answer the phone, send out letters to new visitors, create flyers, bulletin inserts and graphics design.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I think this gives people a great opportunity to expand their horizons, and dream bigger.
lender.occupational_info: I am solely a student. I learn and try as best as I can to help others and teach others along the way.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I believe in women
lender.occupational_info: We have two children ages 13 and 15. We own an engineering business that builds schools in California

lender.loan_because: I want to give people new opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineering project manager where I design and build early engineering development vehicles at General Motors for new/future models.

lender.loan_because: This is the best way to better the World.
lender.occupational_info: I build training software for the U.S. Government.

lender.name: Shelagh

lender.occupational_info: Taking a break from the office to stay home with my new baby girl.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: Me deixa bem feliz, poder ajudar um pouco, e saber a quem e como: é uma conexão pessoal com outro ser humano, menos afortunado mas disposto a trabalhar para realizar conquistas. Convido todos que chegarem a esta página a experimentarem! Basta um cartão de crédito internacional e uma conta segura PayPal (pros dados do seu cartão não ficarem voando por aí... ).

lender.name: Saroj
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people and lift them out of poverty.

lender.name: T Daneen
lender.loan_because: I have been extremely blessed. I feel it is my obligation to help others in need when I can.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.occupational_info: I teach graduate students about business, focusing on marketing, so I enjoy helping people around the world operate businesses that meet the needs of their local market.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for blessings and wish to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a handweaver, spinner, and make handcrafted wool socks.

lender.name: kirsten
lender.loan_because: I had a helping hand, and want to give someone else a hand.
lender.occupational_info: desk work in an office.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make books that are interesting, informative, or fun to read.

lender.name: JOHNBEY
lender.loan_because: I honestly care. The state of our world is in need of serious repair corporations are currently maximizing profits on a global scale irresponsibly regardless of environment, local culture, or ethics.
lender.occupational_info:
Epic Travel opportunities abound...no matter the type of trip you're looking for local or international, we can help you plan it. Whether you're searching for a Caribbean cruise, a golfing experience, a Holiday getaway for the entire family or simply a trip leaving soon, we're sure you will be able to find just the vacation you're looking for. This is a world wide company base in Wash.,DC. In addition, here are some of the services we provide to our costumers include: Airline Tickets National/International, 9 different Cruise lines, 12 Rental Cars companies, Vacation packages and over 85,000 different Hotels and Suites.
To insure you'll save money! I've included my personal contact info: If you have any issues you can call my direct line at 202-525-2510 or Email me at JKHADHAFI@GMAIL.com Hopefully we can ultimately establish a very strong business relationship that would bring new and exciting ways to travel.
John-Bey Founder/CEO
Research now at www.YTBtravel.com/Epic8
www.TravewithEpic.com Launch Date: TBA Coming Soon

lender.name: Aditi

lender.name: dadeng
lender.loan_because: I need capital to buy herbal medicines to be sold again. so I can benefit from the sale.
lender.occupational_info:
I traded natural remedies or herbs. natural medicines is now much sought as alternatives to cure diseases such as stroke, kidney, diabetes, high blood pressure, low blood, dengue fever, diabetes, kidney stones, gout, rheumatism, cholesterol, get rid of nicotine, anti-tumor, hemorrhoids , slimming, fertility, menstrual pain, vaginal discharge etc.. I also opened a bruise therapy (taking blood from the body dirty) with the traditional method of Chinese and Arabs.
==== in Indonesian saya berdagang obat-obatan alami atau herbal. obat-obatan alami sekarang banyak dicari orang sebagai alternatif untuk menyembuhkan berbagai penyakit seperti strok, kencing manis, darah tinggi, darah rendah, demam berdarah, diabetes, batu ginjal, asam urat, reumatik, kolesterol, hilangkan nikotin,anti tumor, wasir, pelangsing, kesuburan,nyeri haid, keputihan dan lain lain. saya juga membuka terapi bekam (mengambil darah kotor dari dalam tubuh) dengan metode tradisional dari cina dan arab.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think it is important to help others when we can. The risks are none and the rewards are plenty....

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: It's pretty awesome. I usually lend to places where I've been, and get a feel for. Makes me feel like I might have met the person I loan to. It's kind of awesome.

lender.name: Patric L.
lender.loan_because: "Lives based on having are less free than lives based either on doing or on being." - William James (January 11, 1842 – August 26, 1910)

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: It´s a good feeling to help people
lender.occupational_info: with one word. Interesting

lender.name: Lisa Ann
lender.loan_because: ...I can. I feel so grateful for all that I have and cannot enjoy such abundance without sharing it. I believe that discipline, working and repayment is important in one's personal growth. Gifts are good too. I do both.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Peri-Anesthesia. I take care of you prior to surgery and immediately afterwards. I also am interested in infectious disease prevention and am involved in a local Organization, APIC. Viruses fascinate me!

lender.name: julian, sonia, and keith
lender.loan_because: it is the least we can do to help others less fortunate than us
lender.occupational_info: we are a family with one child. mother is a professor in anthropology, father works on environmental and energy issues, son is in first grade and just turned 6 years old.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who work to create a better world
lender.occupational_info: I work with the energy and ideas God gives me to assist in healing emotional and physical causes of dis ease and to teach others how to do the same

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: None of us know when we may become in need of assistance. I would hope Kiva would be there if ever I needed a little help.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I can. It's really not my money anyway. The King will reply, 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me. Matt 24:40
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small business in the southern United States.

lender.name: AnirbanG
lender.loan_because: I Like To Help Needy People

lender.loan_because: I want to share Jesus' love in practical ways. I have volunteered with Christian organisations in the medical field in Peru and the Philippines and have a love for the people in these countries.

lender.name: DJ
lender.loan_because: I realise how lucky I am to do so.

lender.name: stinne
lender.loan_because: It matters

lender.name: Al
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so much in my health and wealth. I cannot share my health with others in different parts of the world, but I can share my wealth.

lender.name: Gonska

lender.name: Skaiste
lender.loan_because: A small loan can go a long way for some people.

lender.name: KIVA at Conference
lender.loan_because: We are putting our principles into action and change the world one micro loan at a time!!!
lender.occupational_info: In 2010, in Victoria, all registrants were given a KIVA gift certificates! In 2011, in Toronto, we will be giving out over 160 gift certificates through Random Acts of KIVA Kindness! Want more info - kivaatconference@shaw.ca

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I care about social justice. I want to teach my students about how to impact the world around them. I hope to one day see poverty eradicated.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school History to 9th graders at an all girls school. I also lead an Immersion trip to the Tenderloin, SF to teach girls about and have them experience solidarity with the homeless. I am also the Forensics director, so I run the Speech and Debate program.

lender.name: Redirections
lender.loan_because: we believe in the power of small business entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We are a B2B custom sign manufacturer specializing in digital graphics, permanent monument signage, interior displays, sandblasted signs, screen printed signs, vinyl graphics, & car wraps.

lender.name: Aimie
lender.loan_because: I want to help as many people achieve their dreams as I can. It is so admirable what many people are doing to help better their lives :)
lender.occupational_info: I run our household and raise our children.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: why not!

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: there is no reason not to!

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: It is very rewarding to help a person to achieve their goals.

lender.name: Jeremy Gorven
lender.loan_because: Living in a country where millions have grown up under oppression and without privilege or equal opportunity, I as privileged and fortunate South African acknowledge my responsibility and relish the opportunity to contribute meaningfully toward the support of entrepreneurial endeavor which would otherwise not have been possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Finance Honours graduate from the University of Cape Town, South Africa. I am seeking an opportunity to use my energies, skills and passion for social upliftment anywhere in the world.

lender.name: Antoine
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have a lot of encouragement and support in my life, and I appreciate being able to encourage and support others as they forge their lives and dreams.

lender.name: Talee
lender.occupational_info: I create computer programs that run on the internet, very similar to the people who create the pages on this website.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: my daughter is adopted from Armenia and I want to do anything I can to help her homeland.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former school teacher and currently volunteer to teach reading to struggling readers. Otherwise, I am at home to help raise our three children.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with church volunteers to teach children about God and his love for us.

lender.name: Banke
lender.loan_because: I secretly want everyone in the world to be rich.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It gives me the opportunity to pay it forward. Others provided me with a helping hand when I was a raising my son as a single mother. Now I have the opportunity to help others.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: As Michael Jackson said "I'm looking at the man in the mirror..."

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in human resources, helping companies find the right people for their job openings. I also help students prepare for interviews with companies.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I received this opportunity as a gift but it's such a good idea that I would like to be more involved in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to grow; people who take my classes and my daughter. In order to grow we must feel ourselves as whole: to feel less like a mind who controls a body that doesn't feel the spirit but to exist like a wholly involved, undivided entity of love.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because:
I make my living as a Lender to Small & Medium size businesses and I want to "give back" in a meaningful way to others who need capital who may not have access to it like we do here in the USA.
I also want to set an Example for my new Grandson Noah that helping others meet their day to day needs is one of the great lessons of the Bible....Helping Others as you would have them help you.. I praise God for the ability to do just that. Thank You Lord !
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Finance & Equipment Leasing Executive/Entrepreneur

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: this appears to be the appropriate thing to do in the circumstances.

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: I realize how lucky I am to have a good job, happy family, to live in the US and have a beautiful house and life. I realize how hard it is for others to bring themselves up from the life they were born into and would like to share some of what I have with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, providing care in a hospital to patients after surgeries, or sometimes those with medical issues.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: I, along with my crew, sail to remote places around the world providing free medical care.

lender.name: Afua
lender.occupation: voluntier worker with a church in UK.

lender.name: Ligia
lender.loan_because: I believe we can change the world through small gestures.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I think it is great to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work in a kindergarten class

lender.name: B.J. and Mike
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing. We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: We help small business owners grow their businesses, become more profitable, and manifest their values and talents in their communities. And have fun!

lender.name: shekinah
lender.loan_because: I am a single parent of 2 and I know how hard it can be to get ahead and make a better life for your children.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital emergency department helping the nurses.

lender.name: Mollie
lender.loan_because: I want to see women in impoverished countries be able to support themselves and their families. I like that this program allows women the financial backing to be independent.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with students who have special learning needs and behavioral difficulties.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: Those of us with so much, should help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I get cities to rethink how they grow.

lender.name: Barry & Cindy (Coda)
lender.loan_because: Just trying to do the next right thing

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: Because it is the right thing to do. Women need to support each other to grow and be successful. This I believe will change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and digital xray equipment for hospitals and clinics.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to help women around the world achieve their dreams. Helping women who care about their children, their culture, their enviroment creates a better world for all human beings
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother first, I believe that is my dharma for this life...Now my children are grown, so I would like to help others around the world. For work I do accounting and enjoy helping people learn the importance of handling their money wisely.

lender.name: Tayo
lender.loan_because: It is the will of God that we bless others as He has blessed us.
lender.occupational_info: I work in hiring and managing business personnel needs.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I love all people of the world and will do whatever I can to better as many lives as possible within my lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full-time graduate student studying Urban Planning.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I want to help end poverty and conserve our natural resources.
lender.occupational_info:
Resource Conservation Management, LLC assists power companies with the implementation of energy efficiency measures. Our goal is to reduce energy consumption by converting inefficient lighting technologies to the most efficient technology available.
In most cases the energy upgrade will reduce energy consumption by 50%-95%. This will greatly reduce electricity bills freeing up money for building the economy, improving our schools and helping to end poverty.
The return on investment for upgrading your facility is usually realized within the first 10,000 hours of usage. The life expectancy of the technology we offer is 80,000 hours; Allowing for 70,000 hours of maintenance free - energy and replacement bulb savings.

lender.name: Ted Regencia
lender.loan_because: I am not a well-off person, but I consider myself very blessed. I want to share the little that I have to those, who are less fortunate, and who are struggling every day to make ends meet. I want to empower others, and help them help themselves.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: If $25 can help someone, it's a small price to pay.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: improving someone's living conditions via economic support is a huge step toward improving their health.
